name: Lip Teasers Lip Gloss
about: What it is:A hydrating, cushiony, serum-like formula that glides on effortlessly and delivers the color intensity of a lipstick with the brilliance of a gloss..Formulation Type:Lip Gloss.Benefits:Hydrating, Long-wearing.Highlighted Ingredients:- Castor Oil: Softens and visibly plumps lips with a rich supply of omega fatty acids..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This nonsticky, hydrating formula delivers a non-feathering pop of color with high shine in one swipe. It‚Äôs enriched with nurturing oils and herbal extracts to visibly rejuvenate your lips.
ingredients: -Castor Oil: Softens and visibly plumps lips with a rich supply of omega fatty acids. .-SunÔ¨Çower Seed Oil: Delivers balm-like hydration. .-Rosemary Leaf: Conditions...Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Castor Oil/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Silica, Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire De Candelilla, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tin Oxide. May Contain/Peut Contenir (¬±): CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 17200 (Red 33 Lake), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Glide onto lips using the plush applicator..-Wear alone or layer over Fashion Fair‚Äôs Iconic Lipstick (sold separately).

reviews.review_text: I believe the lipsticks are creamier than the lip gloss. This shade seemed lighter than online photos.

reviews.review_title: Glad to see this brand back!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty!  Awesome coverage and nice neutral shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like the idea of a thin, yet pigmented lip oil, this is the formula for you. Whenever I take this formula off of my lips, I find them to be soft and nourished. The first swipe of this is a light wash that shows up on my pigmented lips and can be built up. As you build it up, the gloss does not get too thick where you can feel it on the lips or the pigment starts pooling unevenly in my lip lines.   It isn't the longest wearing gloss, but it does stay on through regular wear minus the usual eating/drinking.   I first picked up Supreme Brown (pictured with a lip liner) and then got Purple Onyx (pictured without a lip liner) since I enjoyed the formula so much. I added two photos in different lighting/applications. Truly a one of a kind lip formula.  I hope more shades get released in the future as this is one of my favorite formulas at the moment. A deep mauve or a deep pink like Ganache with more pink would be amazing!

reviews.review_title: More people should know about this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was absolutely betrayed by the Dior Lip Oil and found this product while moping around the local Sephora. This is the perfect glossy tint. I can‚Äôt believe I haven‚Äôt used this sooner. Purple Onyx is absolutely gorgeous and can build up to be bolder in color. This doesn‚Äôt fade or slide around. The shimmer is subtle and feels luxurious versus craft glitter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the color! The only problem is I don't like lip gloss. I prefer a lip color that stays on and doesn't transfer. If I could get this color in something like that, I would be very happy.

reviews.review_title: Very creamy and glossy with no stickiness!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! So creamy and glossy. I'm not really a red lip girl but I definitely enjoyed using this as a lip stain as well as a blush. I don't have a red lip liner but I know that would have taken the glossy red lip to the next level!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love ittt omgüòç it‚Äôs amazing After trying this lipstick they won't want another one, it's very cute, it looks beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was expecting red, but this comes out more in the pink shade for me. It has a nice texture and isn‚Äôt sticky at all. It does go pretty light once pressed in. Good product, just not my color.

reviews.review_title: Great add on to my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great Product! I really love the color & opaqueness. One swipe is all I needed to cover my lips. It‚Äôs so smooth and honestly feels like a serum. I love how hydrating it looks & feels.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the shade Purple Onyx which is a really pretty deeper purple. It goes on very smooth and feels hydrating on my lips. The one thing that was a bit different is the wand is flat which was different when applying the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very pigmented and decently long lasting. It does transfer but it is very comfortable to wear and not drying. Looks pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really great gloss with great pigment, my only downside would be the price point is a little higher than other great glosses, other than that it‚Äôs a really good gloss though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The pigment is there, the wear is comfortable, and the color is gorgeous. Like almost every gloss, it isn‚Äôt a transfer proof. It has a yummy smell, but price point is a bit high. I received free for review.

reviews.review_title: Finally a good nude for olive skinned brunettes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve been looking for the perfect nude for olive skin/brunette combo and this is it! So pretty and so comfortable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The f√≥rmula for this is amazing! It feels really smooth when I apply it, and the color is very bright and sexy. But I didn‚Äôt like the way it stained my lips after removing it but for the most part it was really good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received my package and it said it was red but I got purple instead. I‚Äôm not really a fan of the color on me. It‚Äôs not long laying like I would like for it to be. Easily smears off. It wasn‚Äôt sticky which was a plus. Overall formula was okay. I don‚Äôt think I would purchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression from this product was its packaging. The packaging looks very clean and classic. The color I received was medium nude. The shade looks stunning in its packaging, however, it did not look good on my medium complexion. The shade appeared gray almost brown on my skin. The formula was great, nothing too sticky but also not long wearing.

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous color, easy to apply, doesn't last long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. This gloss is easy to apply, the wand was a bit awkward though. The color was beautiful, very vibrant. It went on effortlessly. It felt very smooth on my lips. The cons are it did not last very long at all. I had to reapply multiply times throughout the day. I know it's a gloss, I still wish it lasted longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The pigment is there, the wear is comfortable, and the color is gorgeous. Like almost every gloss, it isn‚Äôt a transfer proof. It has a yummy smell, but price point is a bit high. I received free for review.
